Among IAMs, the DICE model 30 31 32 (2013R) is one of the most commonly used by scholars and national agencies (e.g. the US Environmental Protection Agency). This model has been broadly used for optimizing the emission reduction rate of CO 2 and reinvestment of the gross world product (GWP) according to different constraints and criteria.
